    • findAvailTable

      public entities.Table findAvailTable​(LocalDateTime checkInTime, int noOfPax)
      Finds an available table Returns Table object if there exists an available table Otherwise returns null
      Parameters:
      checkInTime - the time that a customer checks in
      noOfPax - the number of pax at the table
      Returns:
      Table object if found, null if no table available table found

      Parameters:

      date - date and time of the table to deallocate

    • printTableAvailability

      public void printTableAvailability​(int noOfPax, LocalDateTime date)
      Prints the available tables' seating capacity and table id if there exists an available table
      Parameters:
      noOfPax - number of pax at the table
      date - date and time of the table to check

      public void saveData() throws IOException
      Serializes and saves the Table objects into the data/table folder Creates the data/table folder if it does not exist
      Throws:
      IOException - if stream to file cannot be written to or closed

    • loadSavedData

      public void loadSavedData() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Reads Serialized Table data in the data/table folder and stores it into the tables HashMap
      Throws:
      IOException - if stream to file cannot be written to or closed
      ClassNotFoundException - if serialized data is not of the Table class
